de.emotreco.facialexpressionmodel

Class FacialExpressionDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.emotreco.facialexpressionmodel.FacialExpressionDescriptor

  • public class FacialExpressionDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class to interprete the pixel values from a CSVFrame object into FacialExpression objects (see the .java files).

    • Constructor Detail

      • FacialExpressionDescriptor

        public FacialExpressionDescriptor(FeatureFrame[] featureFrames)
        Create a descriptor containing the definitions for when an expression is categorised as one of low, medium or high.
        Parameters:
        featureFrames - The first known frames from the csv file. For the WBS task this means the first 35 frames. Others a randomly.

    • Method Detail

      • describeFrame

        public FacialExpression[] describeFrame(FeatureFrame frame)
        Describe a frame with facial expressions, used as key for an emotion in Emotions.java.
        Parameters:
        frame - the FeatureFrame to get all the FacialExpressions for
        Returns:
        An array of the winning intensities for the different expressions

      • calculateLow

        private FacialExpression calculateLow(java.lang.String key,
                                      int i,
                                      float x)
        Calculate the confidence for low.
        Parameters:
        key - key of the facial expression e.g. "Stirnfalten"
        i - index of the feature
        x - the measured pixel value
        Returns:
        A facial expression which could be the winner
